Instrument.name: LONG RANGE RECONNAISSANCE IMAGER
Instrument.description: The New Horizons Long Range Reconnaissance Imager (LORRI) is a panchromatic narrow angle imager. The primary objectives of the experiment are to obtain long range coverage of the Pluto Charon system for advance planning for the flyby, obtain images at 40 km resolution or better of the entire surface of Pluto for 3.2 days preceding and following the encounter, and return close-up images of the surface of Pluto during the closest approach.
